path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - OpenEden Vault - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Timestamp Dependence
findings.description: The smart contract relies on timestamp, which can be manipulated by miners.

findings.title: Race Conditions
findings.description: Transaction-Ordering Dependence, DoS with (Unexpected) revert, and DoS with Block Gas Limit

findings.title: DoS with (Unexpected) revert
findings.description: This finding indicates a potential Denial of Service vulnerability due to unexpected reverts in the smart contract.
